ognon.control package¶

Submodules¶

ognon.control.animsmanager module¶

This module provide control functions to manage project’s anims

ognon.control.animsmanager.del_anim(cursor, name)[source]¶

Delete an Anim from anims dict.

ognon.control.animsmanager.new_anim(cursor, name)[source]¶

Add a new Anim to anims dict.

ognon.control.animsmanager.select_anim(cursor, name)[source]¶

Set cursor anim name.
